title: Confession
content: I’ve always admired you from afar, but never had the courage to say it.

title: Feedback
content: Your website looks amazing! Maybe add a dark mode for late-night users.

title: Appreciation
content: Thanks for being so kind and helpful. You make people’s days better.

title: Random Thought
content: Sometimes silence says more than words ever could.

title: Anonymous Secret
content: I still remember the day we met. It changed everything for me.
